subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tomas Plekanec scored twice and Cristobal Huet stopped 17 shots for the Montreal Canadiens on Tuesday night in a 3-1 victory over the Islanders at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Tomas Plekanec scored twice and Cristobal Huet stopped 17 shots for the Montreal Canadiens on Tuesday night in a 3-1 victory over the Islanders at Nassau Coliseum.
